fullForm: Postgraduate Institute of Medical Education and Research Entrance Exam
conductingBody: Postgraduate Institute of Medical Education and Research (PGIMER), Chandigarh
eligibility: Candidates must have completed MBBS or an equivalent degree from a recognized university and must have completed the required internship period. For PhD and MPH, relevant postgraduate qualifications are required.
subjectsTested: Relevant Subject for Course (e.g., Public Health for MPH, Research Aptitude for PhD)
examFrequency: Twice a year (typically in June and December for most courses)

faqs.question: Which entrance exam is accepted by PGIMER for MD/MS admissions?
faqs.answer: For MD/MS admissions, PGIMER accepts the INICET entrance exam conducted by AIIMS, New Delhi. For some other courses like PhD and MPH, PGIMER conducts its own entrance test.
